Hi, im working on hardware and software pieces to control fuel dispensers over internet :

. Daily volumes and amounts,

. Error log etc..

Today i have completed the analysis of 2 protocols :

. Tokheim current loop ( so called EIN protocol )

. Nuovo pignone ( RS485 ) used for example by the WAYNE IGEM fuel dispensers

Im looking for people with knowledge of other brands of fuel dispensers's protocols and share the things

Thanks
